RedrotdomWorld.name: Redrotdom
RedrotdomWorld.description: This place used to be a prosperous kingdom before getting destroyed due to natural disasters 1000 years ago. Very few people are living here nowadays.

Village.name: Village
Village.description:
The village where you were born.
You can earn `üí≤5`/h as well as change your class here

MiningCamp.name: Mining Camp
MiningCamp.description:
An iron ore near the village. Several machines from 1000 years ago are still active here, but it seems that their operations are abnormal.
You can earn `üí≤10`/h here

MysticForest.name: Mystic Forest
MysticForest.description: A mysterious forest. It is said that the forest wasn't destroyed in the disaster 1000 years ago?

WorldCenter.name: World Center
WorldCenter.description:
The center of Redrotdom.
Your HP depletes `‚ù§Ô∏è10`/h here so be careful!

Unmtron.name: Unmtron
Unmtron.description: A broken robot which was created from the lost technology. It attacks any living creatures it encounters.

SupremeEnforcerCyborg.name: Supreme Enforcer Cyborg
SupremeEnforcerCyborg.description: Who tf created this destructive robot?
